title: Corsair TM30 Performance Thermal Paste
product_list_short_description: Enthusiast CPU And GPU Thermal Compound
cat_seo_title: Thermal Paste Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Thermal Paste at the best price in Bangladesh. Best Thermal Paste for CPU & GPU Components available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
product_page_short_description: Enthusiast CPU And GPU Thermal Compound
full_description:
Corsair TM30 Performance Thermal Paste

Premium zinc oxide-based thermal compound for optimal thermal performance to improve heat transfer and lower temperatures. Ultra-low thermal impedance lowers CPU temperatures vs common thermal paste. CORSAIR TM30's low viscosity allows it to easily fill microscopic abrasions and channels in your CPUs heat spreader and coolers contact plate, for maximum thermal transfer area. CORSAIR TM30s high-stability liquid compound lasts for years with no drying, cracking or change inconsistency, so you don't have to worry about changing or re-applying thermal paste periodically. TM30 is non-conductive and contains zero volatile compounds, making it safe for both you and your PC.

full_description:
DeepCool EK720-XS-1.0 High Performance Thermal Pad

The DeepCool EK720-XS-1.0 thermal pads are designed to conduct heat away from microchips to be dissipated through a heat sink. Replace aging and low-quality interfaces for increased thermal performance on chip components in laptops, graphics cards, game consoles, or in other electronics. The DeepCool EK720-XS-1.0 is highly durable with high thermal conductivity. The pliable interface fills in any pockets and gaps between surfaces for a seamless match. Rated at 6W/mK as defined through standardized testing compared to competing products with uncertain methodologies. The DeepCool EK720-XS-1.0 comes with no warranty.

title: Thermaltake TG-60 Liquid Metal Thermal Paste
cat_seo_title: Thermal Paste Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Thermal Paste at the best price in Bangladesh. Best Thermal Paste for CPU & GPU Components available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Thermaltake TG-60 Liquid Metal Thermal Paste

The Thermaltake TG-60 Liquid Metal Thermal Paste is a ground-breaking invention made to optimize heat dissipation in high-performance computer systems. The focus placed on the TG-60 liquid metal compound's unparalleled cooling efficiency elevates the standard for thermal interface materials. The TG-60 is designed to facilitate rapid heat transfer without relying on conventional thermal compounds, ensuring superior cooling efficiency with its exceptional thermal conductivity value of 52 W/m-k. The superior conductivity of this material facilitates the effective dissipation of heat generated by the CPU and GPU components, maintaining optimal operating temperatures even under high loads and during overclocking efforts. Thermaltake's stringent testing protocols authenticate the effectiveness of the TG-60, showcasing its exceptional cooling capacities in practical scenarios. Every model was put through thorough testing, with full load circumstances applied for 30 minutes at an ambient temperature of 25°C and 50% humidity, in a controlled Thermal Chamber setting. The TG-60 frequently beats traditional thermal compounds during overclocking sessions up to 4.8 GHz, demonstrating its capacity to maintain lower temperatures and retain peak performance levels. The TG-60's adaptability also includes its ability to work with a variety of materials, such as copper and nickel-plated surfaces, that are frequently found in CPU and GPU heatsinks. This wide range of applications guarantees a smooth integration into a variety of computer systems, offering a dependable solution for thermal management to both amateurs and experts. In the field of thermal interface materials, the Thermaltake TG-60 Liquid Metal Thermal Paste is a monument to creativity and performance perfection. Designed to satisfy the needs of contemporary computing, it provides unmatched thermal conductivity, outstanding cooling capabilities, and compatibility with a wide range of hardware setups, which makes it the perfect option for enthusiasts looking to get the most out of their systems.

full_description:
Cooler Master CryoFuze Thermal Paste

The Cooler Master CryoFuze Thermal Paste is a breakthrough solution designed to increase your computer's processing power by improving heat transmission. CryoFuze utilizes cutting-edge nanoparticle technology to achieve improved bonding and thermal conductivity across all processing components. With an outstanding thermal conductivity (K value of 14W/mK), this thermal paste excels at handling even the most severe system setups, providing efficient heat dissipation and optimum operating temperatures. Its non-corrosive, oxidation-resistant composition avoids solidification, protecting metal contact surfaces and increasing the lifespan of your system. CryoFuze's temperature performance is versatile, with stability ranging from -50°C to 250°C, making it appropriate for a variety of system designs. CryoFuze's precisely controlled viscosity allows for easy application and cleanup, making it ideal for both rookie builders and seasoned PC enthusiasts.
